translation: Abandoning unreservedly all desires born of Sankalpa (thought and imagination) and completely restraining the whole group of senses by the mind from all sides.
commentary: 6.24 Sankalpaprabhavan born of Sankalpa (imagination)? Kaman desires? Leaving having abandoned? All of them all? Infinitely without reserve? Manasa by the mind? Eve even? Indriyagramam the whole group of senses? Regulatory completely restraining? all around from all sides.Commentary Without reserve The mind is so diplomatic that it keeps certain desires for its secret gratification.
